text: We believe that the next generation of
AI will not just be language.

It'll be very rich audio visual,
and something that partners
and interacts with us.

We are bringing our
models to Amazon Bedrock.

Luma's models are
purpose-built to make sure
that they produce really high quality
and very usable outputs.
That means smooth motion.
That means very high quality results,
and this means that your teams,
whether they're working on design,
whether they're working on prototyping,

whether they're working in
in film production, ads,

marketing, they are able
to use the outputs produced
by these models directly. In Bedrock,

our customers are able to access
our models in a very secure
and scalable environment.

This is where the
applications already are,
and now they can bring the power

of the Luma visual
intelligence models into their
applications in a very secure environment.
By using these models,

teams will not only be
able to accomplish things
that are really, really difficult to do,

but actually that are
impossible to do today.

We are very excited about
bringing these really advanced
visual capabilities to our customers.

Amazon is a
great partner in our journey
to build this next generation of AI.
